contentBody.body:
Claim #2: "Other vendors offer better performance and efficiency."

Pure's Advantage: FlashBlade delivers high throughput and low latency, making it ideal for demanding workloads such as AI, machine learning, and analytics. Its architecture is designed for high performance and scalability, providing multidimensional performance without optimizing for any one type of performance profile or requiring ongoing performance optimizations.
contentBody.headline: Claim #1: "Other vendors offer better performance and efficiency."
